channel.title: Rooms & Suites on Gasthof Spessartruh Steiger
channel.description: Recent content in Rooms & Suites on Gasthof Spessartruh Steiger

item.title: Suite
item.description:
Amenities:

  • Comfortable box spring beds
  • Living area with dining table & espresso machine
  • Kitchen with oven and stove
  • Bathroom with rain shower
  • 55-inch Smart TV
  • Sofa bed
  • Large balcony with dining table and morning sun
  • Wi-Fi

  • Wi-Fi
